modShortDescription: This mod extends the newbie jacket buff to prevent food/water loss (only) during the entire game.
modDescription:
This mod extends the newbie jacket buff to prevent [food](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-food/)/water loss (only) during the entire game. Note that stamina buff, heat/cold protection is not included beyond lvl 5.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qx_trvW6fsx7QpKnyhWPQdkxIWf76bCA/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23565-foodless-never-eatdrink-a193-tested/).

**Credits:** [Fixation](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/fixation/)
